title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with Next.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring user authentication, product listings, and a shopping cart.

title: Mobile Chat App
description: A real-time chat application developed using React Native and Firebase, supporting text messages, image sharing, and user presence.

title: Portfolio Website V2
description: My personal portfolio website, showcasing my projects and skills, built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for a modern and responsive experience.

title: Design System Library
description: A reusable UI component library for consistent design across multiple projects, built with Storybook and styled with Tailwind CSS.

title: Task Management API
description: A RESTful API for task management, developed with Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL, including user authentication and CRUD operations.

title: AI-Powered Content Generator
description: A web application leveraging AI models to generate creative content, built with Next.js and integrated with various AI APIs.
